price: 这是安拉的迹象，本着真理，我对你宣读它，安拉不欲亏枉众生。
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wamā al-lahu yurīdu ẓul'man lil'ʿālamīna
